stimulus:
Welcome to the experiment.

Press any key to begin.

In this experiment, 4 images will appear on the screen. 3 out of 4 images were generated with a certain rule while one image (the odd one out) does not respect this rule.

Select the odd one out by clicking on the image.

Following your choice, you will be asked to rate how confident you were about your choice on a scale from 1 to 100. Then, you will receive feedback on the trial.

For each rule you will perform 21 trials. You will be notified at each rule change.

The following 3 trials will allow you to get familiar with the odd-one-out task. The experiment starts after this practice session.

Press any button to continue
